backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control, and numerous maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, profiles, tags, likes, and activity tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items describing UI modifications to LilyPage and the associated frontend files, components, and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files, describing layout, component behavior, and page purposes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the app, sets metadata, and mounts the React application into the #root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Renders a bookmark toggle button using useBookmarks, updating UI state without triggering navigation.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and a copyright line referencing caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, search bar, mobile search modal, avatar display, and create-menu actions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Top-level layout wrapping pages with Header, Footer, and a mobile sidebar drawer that closes on navigation.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the main navigation sidebar with links and recent activity items, adapting styles based on route matching and mobile drawer mode.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post card with title, metadata, image handling, like/share actions, and optional user or pond avatar.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Provides a mobile drawer wrapper for the LeftSidebar with scroll locking and animated overlay.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details such as creation info, stats, moderators, and join/leave actions with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Renders a mobile pond header with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation between feed and about.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a single ribbit with nesting, likes, replies, user avatars, and reply form logic.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using data from queries with loading skeletons and fallback messages.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile full-screen search modal showing trending searches or suggestions based on input, with selection and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown under a search bar showing trending searches or dynamic suggestions depending on query state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Renders sections for top, trending, and newest tags with activity stats, using query hooks and reusable tag modules.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers for tab list and tab triggers using custom underline-themed classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs stored in localStorage with helpers to toggle, add, remove, and clear bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced value that updates after a delay when the input changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/clear handlers, and identity loading using Dfinity AuthClient with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query currently matches using window.matchMedia and a change listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating pond, user, and membership data via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables plus utility classes for UI styling and dark mode.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notation such as k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and provides error messages for alphanumeric pond names.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using the Web Share API or clipboard fallback with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and returns error messages for alphanumeric tags.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages username, user ID, and Froggy Phrase storage and restoration in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements a per-lily cooldown system for view counting using timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the Ribbit About page with platform description, features, and guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with loading states, join status, and links to individual pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form page for creating lilies with support for text, image, or link posts, tag suggestions, and pond selection.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a new pond including name validation, description, images, and a required multi‑word froggy phrase.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays main lily feed with trending/new sorting, search results, and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily with details, comments, likes, view tracking, and interaction actions.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays pond details, moderators, visibility, and allows leaving the pond.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s feed, handles joining ponds, loads pond data and lilies, and shows loading or not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for an individual post page.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows locally bookmarked lilies, loading states, and allows removing unavailable or saved items.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with loading states and navigation to individual tag pages.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a given tag with sorting, canonical tag redirects, and loading UI.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: User settings panel handling username changes, avatars, profile data, joined ponds, admin features, and Froggy Phrase management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's state, including existing features, new feature requests, and project metadata. It tracks layout updates, avatar changes, and border additions for the Lily page.
